attributes.action: Require disabled drivers' "blue" badges to have the entitled person's photo-id
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Many car parks (in the street, public car parks, supermarkets, civic offices, etc.) provide clearly marked bays for the use of disabled drivers. This concession is frequently abused by non-disabled drivers by (among other things) the use of someone else's badge.

If the badge were required to display a passport-type photo-id of the entitled driver, this anti-social, selfish and inconsiderate behaviour might be reduced; it would certainly be more easily monitored and, where necessary, result in prosecution.
